code: import axios from"axios";export var updateArticleVoteReq=function updateArticleVoteReq(id,inc_votes,path){return axios.patch("https://nc-news2020.herokuapp.com/api/".concat(path,"/").concat(id),{inc_votes:inc_votes}).then(function(_ref){var data=_ref.data;return data;});};export default updateArticleVoteReq;
